actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to provide that information provided to Members of the House of Representatives by the Clerk of the House of Representatives relating to certain expenses incurred by such Members shall be available for public inspection.

summary.text: Provides that any statement or other information furnished by the Clerk of the House of Representatives to any Member of the House of Representatives relating to the expenditure of funds from any expense allowance available for use by such Member shall be available for public inspection.

titles.title: Resolution to provide that information provided to Members of the House of Representatives by the Clerk of the House of Representatives relating to certain expenses incurred by such Members shall be available for public inspection.
